274a1(nyi khri): gnyis su shes par bya ba ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni mi gnyis pa'o// ko'u shika gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnyis su 'dod pa de ni chos kyi dbyings
274a2(nyi khri): la gnyis su 'dod du zad do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ko'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar chos kyi dbyings dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de la gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do// ko'u shi ka gang bsam gtan gyi
274a3(nyi khri): pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnyis su 'dod pa de ni chos kyi
274a4(nyi khri): dbyings la gnyis su 'dod du zad do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar chos kyi dbyings dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa de la gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do// ko'u shi ka gang shes rab kyi pha
274a5(nyi khri): rol tu phyin pa la gnyis su 'dod pa de ni de bzhin nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' dang / bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings la gnyis su 'dod du zad do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ko'u shi ka de ni 'dra
274a6(nyi khri): sngar de bzhin nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' dang / bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de la gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do// ko'u shi ka gang
274a7(nyi khri): bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / sbyir ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa la/
274b1(nyi khri): gnyis su 'dod par mi dba' na' dadang yang dag pa'i mtha' dang bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings la gnyis su 'dod du babang po de ci'i phyir rten de bzhin nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mthag
274b2(nyi khri): dang rnazas ma gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings dang / sbyir pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa de la gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do/ de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis bcom ldan 'das
274b3(nyi khri): mdzang skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol dum 'di lnga dang mi dang / lA ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis phyag bgyi bar 'os paste/ de la bsrabs pas na
274b4(nyi khri): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so// mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// mngon par rdzog
274b5(nyi khri): bar 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das gang gi tshe bdag chos bzang po'i lha'i 'khor du bdag nyid kyi lha'i dbang po'i stan la mchis par gyur pa de'i tshe/ der lha'i bu gang ji snyed bdag gi
274b6(nyi khri): rim gro la mchis pa de dag kun kyang bdag la mchod pa bgyid de/ nam bdag der mchis shing star de la ma mchis pa de'i tshe'ang lha'i bu de dag 'khor der mchis shing lha'i dbang po
274b7(nyi khri): brgya byin star 'di la 'dug cing sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams la chos sngon to// zhes stan de la g.yas phyogs su bskor ba bgyis shing phyag 'tshal te slar mchi'o// bcom ldan 'das de
275a1(nyi khri): bzhin du gang na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di bris shing 'chang ba dang kha ton du bgyid cing gzhar la rgya cher snod bder/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams ra lha dang / klu
275a2(nyi khri): dang gnod sbyin dang dri za dang lha ma yin dang nam mkha' lding dang mi 'am ci dang / lho'i'aphye chen po dza skad cig mchis pa de dag kyang de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom
275a3(nyi khri): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams ni 'di las byung ngo // nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyang 'di las byung ngo // sems can thams cad kyi bde ba'i yo byad thams cad kyang 'di las
275a4(nyi khri): byung ngo zhes shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la phyag bgyes shing / gdud pa bgyis nas slar mchi bar 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung rnams mchod pa mnga' ba'ang / shes rab kyi pha rol
275a5(nyi khri): tu phyin pas yongs su bsgrubs pa'i slad du mchod pa mnga' ste/ de ci'i slad du nen/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe
275a6(nyi khri): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi gzhir gyur to// rgyur rgyur to// rkyen du gyur to// yongs su sgrub par gyur to// bcom ldan 'das de lta bson cha de gnyis las
275a7(nyi khri): bdag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid len to// bcom ldan 'das gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di blangs te/ chos kyi khongs su gtogs pa'i yid kyis kha ton bgyid pa de'i tshe
275b1(nyi khri): 'jigs pa 'am/ bag tsha ba'i mtshan ma tsam yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo // bcom ldan 'das de ci'i slad du 'i ra/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni mtshan ma mchis/ rtags pa ma mchis/ brjod du/
275b2(nyi khri): ma mchis pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni spos su ma mchis pa'o// bcom ldan 'das bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
275b3(nyi khri): bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni mtshan ma mchis/ rtags ma mchis/ brjod du ma mchis pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das pha rol
275b4(nyi khri): tu phyin pa de dag ni smos su pa mchis pa'o// bcom ldan 'das rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar ni mtshan ma mchis/ rtags ma mchis/ brjod du ma mchis pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das rnam
275b5(nyi khri): pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ni spos su ma mchis pa'o// bcom ldan 'das gal te shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mtshan ma mchis pa zhig lags te/ mtshan ma mchis pa ma lags na ri/ de bzhin
275b6(nyi khri): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis chos thams cad la mtshan ma mchis pa dang / rtags ma mchis pa dang / brjod du ma mchis pa dang / spos su ma mchis
275b7(nyi khri): bar thugs su chud de/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/ sems can rnams la mtshan ma mchis pa dang / rtags ma mchis pa dang / brjod
276a1(nyi khri): dum mchis pa dang / spos su ma mchis pa'i chos mi ston te/ bcom ldan 'das de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mtshan ma mchis/ dgas ma mchis/ brjod du ma mchis/
276a2(nyi khri): smos su ma mchis pas de'i slad du de bzhin gshegs pas chos thams cad mtshan ma mchis pa dang / rtags ma mchis pa dang / brjod du ma mchis pa dang / spos su ma mchis par thugs su chud
276a3(nyi khri): de blan med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/ sems can rnams la mtshar ma ma mchis pa dang / rtags ma mchis pa dang / brjod du ma mchis
276a4(nyi khri): pa dang // spos su ma mchis pa'i chos bstan to// bcom ldan 'das de bas na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis me tog dang /
276a5(nyi khri): 'phreng ba dang / spos dang / thug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / sal snyan sna tshogs kyis rim gro dang / bkur sti dang / Thasti stang dang / mdzod
276a6(nyi khri): par bgyi bar 'os pa'o// bris shing me tog dang / 'phreng ba dang / spos dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / sel skar sna tshogs kyis rim gro dang /
276a7(nyi khri): bkur sti dang / bsti stang dang / mchod par bgyi bar 'os pa'o// bcom ldan 'das gang la la zhig shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dzin cing 'chang ba dang / klog cing kun chub par bgyid pa dang / tshul bzhin du
276b1(nyi khri): ming la bgrod pa dang / de bris shing / me tog dang / 'phreng ba dang / spos dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bda' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / bdan dang / sil snyan sna tshogs kyis/
276b2(nyi khri): rim gro dang / bkur sti dang / bsti stang dang / mchod par bgyi ba de ni nam bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas kyi bar du/ des sems can dmyal ba'i rgyud
276b3(nyi khri): kyi dogs pa ma mchis par bgyi'o// byol song gi skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten gyi rgyud kyi dogs pa ma mchis par bgyi'o// nyan thos kyi sa dang rang sangs rgyas kyi sa'i dogs pa ma mchis par/
276b4(nyi khri): bgyi'o// de ni de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ba dang yang mi 'bral bar 'gyur/ sems can yongs su smin par bgyi ba dang nam yang mi 'bral bar gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
276b5(nyi khri): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag la me tog dang / 'phreng ba dang / spos dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / sil sran sna tshogs kyis rimagro
276b6(nyi khri): dang bkur sti dang / bsti stang dang / mchod par bgyid cing / sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du mchi bar 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang gal te stong gsum gyi
276b7(nyi khri): stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung gis byung bur bltams pa zhig kyang stsal/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di'ang bris te stsal na/ bcom ldan 'das dkon mchog
277a1(nyi khri): de gnyis las bdag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid len to// bcom ldan 'das de ci'i slad du zhe na/ 'di las byung ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku
277a2(nyi khri): gdung rnams te/ de bas na de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang / rim gror bgyi ba dang / bkur stir bgyi ba dang / bsti stang du bgyis shing / mchod par bgyi ba lags te/ rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi
277a3(nyi khri): bu mo dag gis de dag la rim gror bgyis/ bkur stir bgyis/ bsti stang du bgyis/ mchod par bgyis na logs par ltung ba dang / ngan song du mchi bar mi 'gyur te/ lha dang mi'i bde ba phun sum tshogs
277a4(nyi khri): pamyong nas/ smon lam gyi tshul bzhin du nyan thos kyi theg pa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa 'am/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi theg pas yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur ro//
277a5(nyi khri): bcom ldan 'das de bas na gang de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ba dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bris pa mthong ba de ni mi 'dra ba ma mchis pa'o// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar
277a6(nyi khri): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa gnyis su ma mchis te/ gnyis su bgyir ma mchis so// bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang gang de bzhin gshegs pa dgra
277a7(nyi khri): bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis cho 'phrul rnam pa gsum la bzhugs te/ mdo dang / dbyangs kyis bsnyad pa dang / lung du bstan pa dang / chos gtan la phab pa bstan pa'i bar
277b1(nyi khri): du gsungs te bshad pa dang // rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la las shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di bzung zhing kun chub par bgyis te/ gzhan la bstan pa de gnyis kyang mi 'drab ma mchis
277b2(nyi khri): so// bcom ldan 'das de ci'i slad du zhe na/ 'di las byung ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams so// 'di las byung ba ni cho 'phrul rnam pa gsum mo//
277b3(nyi khri): 'di las byung ba ni mdo dang / dbyangs kyis bsnyad pa dang / lung du bstan pa dang / chos gtan la bab pa bstan pa'i bar dag go/ bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang shar phyogs kyi
277b4(nyi khri): de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed mang po dang / lho dang / nub dang / byang dang / byang shar dang / shar lho dang / lho nub dang / nub
277b5(nyi khri): byang dang / 'og dang / steng gi phyogs kyi phyogs re re zhing de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed mang pos cho 'phrul rnam pa gsum la bzhug
277b6(nyi khri): te mdo dang / dbyangs kyis bsnyad pa dang / lung du bstan pa dang / chos gtan la bab pa bstan pa'i bar du gsungs te bshad pa dang / rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la las shes rab
277b7(nyi khri): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di bzung zhing kun chub par bgyis te/ gzhan la bstan pa de gnyis kyang mi 'dra ba ma mchis so// bcom ldan 'das de ci'i slad du zhe na/ 'di las byung ba ni phyogs bcu'i de
278a1(nyi khri): bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams so// 'di las byung ba ni cho 'phrul rnam pa gsum mo// 'di las byung ba ni mdo dang / dbyangs kyis bsnyad
278a2(nyi khri): pa dang / lung du bstan pa dang / chos gtan la bab pa bstan pa'i bar dag go bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang phyogs bcu'i phyogs re re zhing 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi
278a3(nyi khri): de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag la me tog dang / 'phreng ba dang / spos dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang /
278a4(nyi khri): sil snyan sna tshogs kyis rim gro dang / bkur sti dang / bsti stang dang / mchod par bgyis pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di glegs bam du bris shing / me tog dang / 'phreng ba dang / spros dang
278a5(nyi khri): byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / sil snyan sna tshogs kyis rim gro dang / bkur sti dang / bsti stang dang / mchod par bgyis pa'ang mi 'dra ba ma
278a6(nyi khri): mchis so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ 'di las byung ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams so// bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang rigs
278a7(nyi khri): kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dzin cing 'chang ba dang / klog cing kun chub par bgyid pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la bgyid cing / gzhan la'ang rgya cher ston
278b1(nyi khri): bde ni sems can dmyal ba'i rgyud kyi dogs pa ma mchis par bgyi'o// byol song gi skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten gyi rgyud kyi dogs pa ma mchis par bgyi'o// nyan thos kyi sa dang rang sangs
278b2(nyi khri): rdzas kyi sa'i dogs pa pa mchis par bgyi'o// de ci'i slad du ned 'di ltar rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de ni phyir mi ldog pa'i sa la gnas par rig par bgyi'o// de ci'i srad du zher
278b3(nyi khri): 'di ltar de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di bris shing 'dzin to// 'chang ngo // klog go// kun chub par bgyid do// tshul bzhin du yid la bgyid do// bris pa de la'ang me tog dang 'greng /
278b4(nyi khri): ba dang / spos dang / thug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / sel snyan sna tshogs kyis rim gror bgyid / bkur
278b5(nyi khri): stir bgyid bsti stang du bgyid mchod par bgyid do// bcom ldan 'das de ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ri 'jigs pa thams cad zhi bar bgyid pa'o// nad rab tu sel ba'o//
278b6(nyi khri): bco ba ldan 'das gnan yang rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di bris shing / 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun tub par bgyid
278b7(nyi khri): pa dang / de la me tog dang / 'phreng ba dang / spos dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / bdan dang / sil snyan sna tshogs kyis rim gro dang
279a1(nyi khri): bkur sti dang / bsti stang dang / mchod par bgyid pa des ni gang nas kyang 'jigs pa 'byung ba'i dogs pa ma mchis par bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ dper na skyes/
279a2(nyi khri): khu nor gyi bdag po zhig 'jigs nas rgyal po la gnas shing / rgyal po la brten na/ de ltar rgyal po la gnas shing / rgyal po la brten pas/ sus 'jigs pa de dag nyid kyang de la rten pas//
279a3(nyi khri): de dag gis bar mi 'gyur ro// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar gsha' ste/ gang rgyal po la brten pa ni mthu dang ldan pa la brten pa'o// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du de bzhin
279a4(nyi khri): gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su bsgrubs pas na mchod pa mnga' 'o// bcom ldan 'das rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ye shes gang lags pa
279a5(nyi khri): de'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su bsgrubs par blta'o// bcom ldan 'das de lta bas na bdag gis cha de gnyis las shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid blang bar bgyi'o// bcom
279a6(nyi khri): ldan 'das de ci'i slad du zhe na/ 'di las byung ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung rnams so// 'di las byung ba ni mi chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis so// 'di las byung ba ni de bzhin gshegs
279a7(nyi khri): pa rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad do// 'di las byung ba ni
279b1(nyi khri): rnams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di las byung ba ni pha rol tu phyin pa lnga ste/ de dag pha rol tu phyin pa'i ming thob bo// 'di las byung ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i
279b2(nyi khri): rnam pa thams cad mkhyed pa nyid kyi bar te/ bcom ldan 'das grong dam grong rdal lam/ grong khyer ram/ khams sam/ rgyal po'i gnas sam stong gsum gyi spong
279b3(nyi khri): chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams gang na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dzin cing 'chang ba dang / klog cing kun chub par bgyid pa dang / de bris shing rim gro dang / bkur sti dang / bsti stang dang /
279b4(nyi khri): mchod par bgyid pa de dag tu/ mi 'am/ mi ma lags pa glags tshol zhing grags lta ba rnams kyis grags red par mi 'gyur te/ sems can de dag thams cad kyang theg pa gsum las theg pa
279b5(nyi khri): gang yang rung bas mthar gyis yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba'i chos can du 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das de lta bas na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni don chen po dang ldan pa ste/ stong gsum gyi
279b6(nyi khri): stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na de ltar sems can rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi don du nye bar gnas so// bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten gyi khams gang na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mchis
279b7(nyi khri): pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams der ni sangs rgyas byung ba dang 'dra bar blta'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ dper na nor bu rin po che chen po mi dpogs rin chen ces bgyi ba mchis te/ de ni nor bu
280a1(nyi khri): rin po che chen po'i yon tan rnam pa 'di lta bu dag dang ldan te/ nor bu rin po che de gang dang gang du bzhag pa de dang der mi ma lags pa rnams kyis grags mi rnyed do// mi ma lags
280a2(nyi khri): pas zin pa'i skyes pa 'am bud med kyang nor bu rin po che de bstan na/ mi ma lags pa de nor bu rin po che chen po de'i gzi brjid mi bzod de/ myur du 'pho zhing mi gnas so// mkhris pas gdungs
280a3(nyi khri): pa'i lus la nor bu rin po che chen po de btags na mkhris pa de'ang 'byang bar 'gyur ro// rlung gi sa mnar ba'i lus la nor bu rin po che de btags na/ rlung de'ang 'byang bar 'gyur ro// bad kan gyis non
280a4(nyi khri): pa'i lus la nor bu rin po che de btags na bad kan de'ang zhi bar 'gyur ro// 'dus pa'i nad kyis btab pa'i lus la nor bu rin po che de btags na/ 'dus pa'i nad de'ang zhi bar 'gyur zhing rnam par mi
280a5(nyi khri): 'phel lo// nub mo ni nor bu rin po che de snang bar bgyid do// tsha ba'i dus na ni nor bu rin po che de phyogs gang du bzhag pa'i phyogs de bsil bar bgyid do// grang ba'i dus na ni nor bu rin po che chen po de
280a6(nyi khri): phyogs gang du bzhag pa'i phyogs de dro bar bgyid do// nor bu rin po che chen po de dog sa'i phyogs gang du bzhag pa'i phyogs de'ang ha cang yang mi dro// ha cang yang mi grang zhing ran pa phun sum tshogs
280a7(nyi khri): par bgyid do// nor bu rin po che chen po de dogs sa'i phyogs gang du bzhag pa'i dog sa'i phyogs der sprul lam/ de ma lags pa sdig pa la sogs pa gdug pa dang / gzhan dag kyang rgyu bar mi
280b1(nyi khri): 'gyur ro// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrags shu lnga phabab po sum du bzhi pa/ bcom ldan 'das skyes pa'am zung me sa la
280b2(nyi khri): skus gdug pas zid pa la dong du napo can po bsan na/ des de mthing ma thag tu dug da'ang byang bar 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das nor bun po che chen po ngan yon tan gyi rnam pa 'di sa dung ga dang ldan
280b3(nyi khri): spros pa 'ab zung med la la zhig 'brum bus btab bam/ mig ra ba rib can du gyur te/ mig gi nang dpa na ba'i nad dam/ sna'i nad dam/ lce'i nad dam srog ma'i nad/
280b4(nyi khri): dab lus kyi nad ci byung ba las/ de'i lus la nor bu rin po che chen po de btags na/ de dag gi 'brum bu 'am/ rab rib bam/ mig gi nad dam/ rna ba'i nad dam/ sna'i nang
280b5(nyi khri): dam lce'i da dam lkog ma'i nad dam/ lus kyi nang de dag kyang zhi bar 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das nor bu rin po che chen po de ni yon tan gyi rnam pa 'di lta bu dag dang yang ldan te
280b6(nyi khri): gal te nor bu rin po che chen po de chab rnyog ma can gyi nang du sprul na/ do'i mod la chab de thams cad kyang yan lag brgyad dang ldan zhing kha dog gcig par 'gyur ro// gal te nor bu rin po che chen po dgos
280b7(nyi khri): sngon pos dkris te chab kyi nang du stsa lan/ cha ba de'ang de'i rang bzhin nyid du 'gyur ro// gal te nor bu rin po che chen po de gos ser po 'am dmar po 'am/ dkar po 'am/ lebargan nam
281a1(nyi khri): shel gyi kha dog gam/ gos gzhan rnam pa snga tshogs kyis nor bu rin po che chen po de dkris te chab tu su la na/ cha ba de'ang de'i rang bzhin nyid du gyur ro// chab de la rnyog ma mchis
281a2(nyi khri): pa'ang nor bu rin po chen po des 'dang ste/ bcom ldan 'das nor bu rin po che chen po de ni yon tan rnam pa de lta bu dag dang / gzhan yang rnam pa mang po dag dang ldan no// bcom ldan 'das shes rab
281a3(nyi khri): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di'ang lha rdzas kyi nor bu rin po che chen po de dang 'dra bar yon tan thams cad kyi 'byung gnas su gyur pa ste/ sdig pa thams cad sel ba'o// de nas tshe dang ldan pa
281a4(nyi khri): dga' bos lha'i dbang po brgya byin la 'di skad ces smras so// ko'u shi ka de ji snyam du sems/ nor bu rin po che chen po de lha rdzas shig yin nam/ 'on tam nor bu rin po che chen po de 'dzam bu gling gi
281a5(nyi khri): mi rnams la'ang yodabargya byin gyis spras pa/ btsun pa dga' bo nor bu rin po che chen po de ni lha rdzas te/ btsun pa dga' bo 'dzam bu'i gling gi mi rnams la nor bu rin po che chen po gang yod pa de dag ni chung zhing
281a6(nyi khri): lI Ta lha rdzas kyi nor bu rin po che chen po de dag ni che zhing yang ste/ 'dzam bu'i gling gi mi rnams kyi nor bu rin po che de dag ni lha rdzas ltar yan lag de dag gis yongs su rdzogs pa ma yin te/ 'dzam bu gling gi
281a7(nyi khri): nor bu rin po che de dag gis ni lha rdzas kyi nor bu rin po che'i grangs sam/ cha 'am/ bgrang ba 'am/ dpe 'am/ rgyur yang nye bar mi 'gro'o// de nas yang lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis
281b1(nyi khri): bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das nor bu rin po che chen po de snod la la zhig gi nang du stsal ba las/ sdod de nas byung yang / spyod de ni nor bu rin po che de'i yon tan gyis yid du/
281b2(nyi khri): mchi bar 'gyur te/ gzhan yang snod de la mos pa bskyed do// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di gang na mchis pa de'i rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de dag gi lus sum/
281b3(nyi khri): sems kyi sdug bsngal dang / gnod pa mi las gyur pa 'am/ mi ma lags pa las gyur pa thams cad kyang ma mchis par 'gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das nor bu rin po che chen po zhes bgyi ba ni/ shes
281b4(nyi khri): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshig bla dgas so// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi tshig bla dgas so// bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i yon tan lha ji snyed cig brjod par bgyi ste/
281b5(nyi khri): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i yon tan ni tshad ma mchis so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i snod do// bcom ldan 'das bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu
281b6(nyi khri): phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / nang stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med/
281b7(nyi khri): pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun
282a1(nyi khri): dang 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang / bsam gtan rnams dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par
282a2(nyi khri): 'jug pa bzhi dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum dang / mngon par shes pa rnams dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams
282a3(nyi khri): dang gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs
282a4(nyi khri): rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang / thams cad shes pa nyid dang / lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ye shes dang / de bzhin nyid dang / ma nor ba de bzhin
282a5(nyi khri): nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang / chos nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings dang / chos kyi gnas nyid dang / chos mi 'gyur ba nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' dang / bsam gyis mi
282a6(nyi khri): khyab pa'i dbyings dang / bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba'i nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs pa dang / rtag tu btang snyoms la gnas pa dang / mi nyams pa'i chos nyid kyi yonaHna ji snyed cig brjod par
282a7(nyi khri): bgyi ste/ mi nyams pa'i chos nyid kyi yon tan ni tshad ma mchis so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang mi nyams pa'i chos nyid kyi sdod do// de bas na de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag ni
282b1(nyi khri): btang ba pa 'o// com la 'das de ba gshegs pa'i sgra ga dung dag ni parol su byud pa dpa 'a thang / rab nyi gshegs pa'i slag dung da dag paras tu phyin pa kyad nas nyon mongs pas satsas/
282b2(nyi khri): rnam par byang bab bcas pa dang / pha rol tu phyin pa 'i skye pi 'gag pa dang / pha rol tu phyin pa blang ba ma mchis pa dang / dor ba ma mchis pa dang / pha rol tu phyin pa dbrib ma mchis pa dang / bsnun par
282b3(nyi khri): mchis pa dang / pha rol tu phyin pa 'ong ba ma mchis/ 'gro ba ma mchis/ gnas pa ma mchis pa'i snod do// de bas na de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag ni mchod pa mnga'a'o// bcom ldan 'das/
282b4(nyi khri): de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag ni pha rol tu phyin pa chos nyid spyod de/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag ni pha rol tu phyin pa'i chos nyid kyi yongs su bsgoms pa'o// de bas ra de bzhin gshes
282b5(nyi khri): pa mya ngan las 'das kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag ni mchod pa mnga' 'o// gzhan yang stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung
282b6(nyi khri): gis byur bur bltams pa lta zhog gi/ bcom ldan 'das gal te phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed cig de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung gis byur bur bltams pa dang
282b7(nyi khri): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa glegs pamal bris pa zhig stsal na/ bcom ldan 'das rnam pa de gnyis las bdag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'i len to// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom
283a1(nyi khri): ldan 'das 'di las byung ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi sku gdung rnams te/ mchod pa mnga' 'o// bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi
283a2(nyi khri): pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su bsgoms pas na/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag mchod pa mnga' ste/ bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang de bzhin gshegs pa'i
283a3(nyi khri): sku gdung rnams la rim gror bgyid pa dang bkur stir bgyid pa dang / bsti stang du bgyid pa dang mchod par bgyid pa'ang dge ba'i rtsa ba de'i mtha' mi dmigs shing rgyal rigs
283a4(nyi khri): che zhing mtho ba 'am/ bram ze'i rigs che zhing mtho ba 'am khyim bdag gi rigs che zhing mtho ba 'am/ rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha 'am sum cu rtsa gsum mam/ mtshe ma 'am/
283a5(nyi khri): dga' ldan rab 'phrul dga' 'am gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha'i nang du mi dang lha'i phun sum tshogs pa dang bde ba myong nas dge ba'i rtsa ba de nyid kyis sdug bsngal gyi mthar
283a6(nyi khri): 'byung ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung mchod pa'i 'bras bu de tsam du bas kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di bzung zhing bcangs pa dang / bklags shing kun chub par bgyis pa
283a7(nyi khri): dang tshul bzhin du yid la bgyis na sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus
283b1(nyi khri): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang bas pa gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi sgra tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// nang stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// dngos po med pa'i ngo bonang /
283b2(nyi khri): spong ba'i dbye bar du yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdud yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar du yongs su
283b3(nyi khri): rdzogs par 'gyur ro// de ched du bsams te lus yongs su 'dzin par 'gyur ro// lus de dag gis sems can yongs su smin par bgyid par 'gyur te/ 'khor lo sgyur ba'i lus sam/ rgyal
283b4(nyi khri): rigs che zhing mtho ba 'am/ bram ze'i rigs che zhing mtho ba 'am/ khyim bdag gi rigs che zhing mtho ba'i gzugs sam/ brgya byin gyi gzugs sam/ tshangs pa'i gzugs sam/ ngal bso bo'i
283b5(nyi khri): gzugs kyang rung ste/ lus de dag gis sems can yongs su smin par bgyid par 'gyur ro// nyan thos kyi sa dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sa las 'das te/ byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med par
283b6(nyi khri): 'jug par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med par zhugs nas/ byang chub sems dpa'i mngon par shes pa thob par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa'i mngon par shes pa thob nas
283b7(nyi khri): sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du mchi bar 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das de bas na bdag ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung la rim gro ma mchis pa'ang ma lags/ gro ba mches pa'ang
284a1(nyi khri): ma mchis mchod par mi 'tshal ba'ang ma lags/ gzung bar mi 'tshal ba'ang ma lags te/ bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni/ rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs
284a2(nyi khri): kyi bu mo rnams kyis rim gro dang / bkur sti dang / bsti stang dang / mchod pa bgyis na/ sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad kyi rgyu shin tu bsags pa lags/ phun sum tshogs pa thams cad kyang
284a3(nyi khri): yongs su zin par 'gyur/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung rnams la'ang rim gro dang / bkur sti dang / bsti stang dang / mchod pa bgyis par 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das
284a4(nyi khri): gzhan yang phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams tshad dang grangs ma mchis pa dag na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ji snyed cig bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba dang /
284a5(nyi khri): chos ston pa de dag chos kyi sku dang / gzugs kyi sku dang / ye shes kyi skur mthong bar 'tshal zhing mchod par 'tshal bas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid gzung bar bgyi/ bcang bar bgyi/
284a6(nyi khri): bklag par bgyi/ kun chub par bgyi/ mchod par bgyi/ gzhan la'ang rgya cher yang dag par bstan par bgyi/ tshul bzhin du'ang yid la bgyi ste/ rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo des/
284a7(nyi khri): ni phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams grangs dang tshad ma mchis pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams mthong bar 'gyur ro// de bas na rigs kyi bu 'am/
284b1(nyi khri): rigs kyi bu mo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa des/ chos nyid du sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa bsgom par bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang rigs kyi bu 'am// rigs kyi bu/
284b2(nyi khri): mo de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag mthong bar 'tshal bas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di gzung bar bgyi/ bcang bar bgyi/ bklag par bgyi/ kun chub
284b3(nyi khri): par bgyi mchod par bgyi/ gzhan la'ang rgya cher yang dag par bstan par bgyi/ chos nyid tshul bzhin du'ang yid la bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das gnyid po 'di dag ni chos nyid de/ gnyis gang
284b4(nyi khri): nen 'dus byas kyi chos rnams kyi chos nyid dang / 'dus ma byas kyi chos rnams kyi chos nyid do// bcom ldan 'das de la 'dus byas kyi chos rnams kyi chos nyid gang lags she na
284b5(nyi khri): nang stong pa nyid kyi ye shes dang / phyi stong pa nyid kyi ye shes dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi ye shes dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar gyi ye shes dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi
284b6(nyi khri): chos sum cu rtsa bdun gyi ye shes dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / rnam
284b7(nyi khri): par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang smon pa med pa'i ye shes dang
285a1(nyi khri): bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi
285a2(nyi khri): chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi ye shes dang dge ba dang / mi dge ba'i chos rnams kyi ye shes dang / zag pa med pa dang / zag pa dang bcas pa'i chos rnams kyi ye shes dang / 'jig rten dang /
285a3(nyi khri): 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos rnams kyi ye shes gang lags pa de ni/ 'dus byas kyi chos rnams kyi chos nyid ces bgyi'o// de la 'dus ma byas kyi chos rnams kyi chos nyid gang lag
285a4(nyi khri): she na/ de ni gang la skye ba ma mchis pa dang / 'gag pa ma mchis pa dang / gnas pa ma mchis pa dang / gnas pa las gzhan du 'gyur ba ma mchis pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa ma mchis pa dang /
285a5(nyi khri): rnam par byang ba ma mchis pa dang / 'phel ba ma mchis pa dang / 'grib pa ma mchis pa ste/ de ni chos thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid do// chos thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid gang lags she na/ chos thams
285a6(nyi khri): cad ni dngos po ma mchis pa'i ngo bo nyid de/ 'di ni 'dus ma byas kyi chos rnams kyi chos nyid ces bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ko'u shi ka de de bzhin no// de de bzhin
285a7(nyi khri): te'adas pa'i dus kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang ji snyed cig byung ba de dag kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid la brten te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
285b1(nyi khri): pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so// pa 'ongs pa'i dus kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang ji snyed cig 'byung ba de dag kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
285b2(nyi khri): ba'adi nyid la brten te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so// da ltar byung ba'i phyogs bcu'i 'jig rter gyi khams tshad med grangs med pa dag de bzhin gshegs/
285b3(nyi khri): pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang ji snyed cig bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba dang / chos ston pa de dag kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid la brten te/ bla na med pa yang dag par
285b4(nyi khri): rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so// 'das pa'i dus kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi nyan thos gang ji snyed cig byung ba dang /
285b5(nyi khri): ma byon pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi nyan thos gang ji snyed cig 'byung ba dang / da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
285b6(nyi khri): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi nyan thos gang ji snyed cig yod pa de dag gis kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid la brten te/ rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu
285b7(nyi khri): dang phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa nyid thob bo// 'thob bo// thob par 'gyur ro// 'das pa'i dus kyi rang sangs rgyas ji snyed cig byung ba dang / ma 'ongs pa'i dus kyi rang sangs rgyas
286a1(nyi khri): ji skad cig 'byung ba dang / da ltar byung ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med tshad med pa dag na rang sangs rgyas gang ji snyed cig 'khod cing 'tsho skyong ba de dag gis kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
286a2(nyi khri): pa 'di nyid la brjen te rang byang chub thob bo// 'thob bo// thob par 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las theg pa gsum po thams cad rgya cher bstan te/ de dag
286a3(nyi khri): kyang mtshan ma med pa'i tshul dang / dmigs pa med pa'i tshul dang / skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa'i tshul dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa'i tshul dang / mngon
286a4(nyi khri): par 'du bya ba med pa'i tshul dang / len pa med pa dang / dor ba med pa'i tshul dang / dbri ba med pa dang / bsnan pa med pa'i tshul dang / blang ba med pa dang / spang ba med pa'i tshul gyis bstan te/ de'ang
286a5(nyi khri): 'jig rten gyi tha snyad kyi tshul gyis bstan gyi/ dor dam par ni ma yin no// de ci'i phyir ne ra/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'i rang du song ba ma yin/ pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin te/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
286a6(nyi khri): pa ni tshu rol ma yin/ pha rol ma yin/ thang du 'dug pa ma yin/ gshong du 'dug pa ma yin/ mnyam pa ma yod/ mi mnyam pa la yin/ mtshan ma ma yar/ mtshan ma med pa ma yin/ 'jig rten
286a7(nyi khri): ba ma lon/ 'jig rten las 'das pa ma yin/ 'dus byas pa yin/ 'dus ma byas ma yin/ dge ba ma yin/ mi dge ba ma yin/ 'das pa ma yin/ ma 'ongs pa ma yin/ da ltar byung ba ma yin te/
286b1(nyi khri): gzu shi ka shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams nye bar sgrub pa ma yin// dgra bcom pa'i bar gyi chos rnams dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ so so'i skye bor/
286b2(nyi khri): chos rnams 'dor ba ma yin no// su byin kyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan sa shes pagyi ros tu phyin pa 'dod pa rol tu phyid pa chen po ste/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/
286b3(nyi khri): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la spyod pa rnams ni/ sems can thams cad kyi sems dang spyod pa'ang 'tshal te/ sems can du dmigs pa ma mchis so// sems can du gdags par dmigs pa
286b4(nyi khri): ma mchis so// bdag dang / sems can dang / srog dang / 'gro ba dang / gso ba dang / skyes bu dang / gang zag dang / shed can dang / shed bdag dang / byed pa po dang / tshor ba po dang / shes
286b5(nyi khri): papo dang / mthong ba por dmigs pa ma mchis so// gzugs su dmigs pa ma mchis/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes par dmigs pa ma mchis so//
286b6(nyi khri): mig tu dmigs pa ma mchis/ yid kyi bar du dmigs pa ma mchis so// gzugs su dmigs pa ma mchis/ chos kyi bar du dmigs pa ma mchis so// mig gi rnam par shes par dmigs pa
286b7(nyi khri): ma mchis/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i bar du dmigs pa ma mchis so// mig gi 'dus te reg par dmigs pa ma mchis/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i bar du dmigs pa ma mchis so// mig gi 'dus
287a1(nyi khri): te reg pa las zung ba'i tshor bar dmigs pa ma mchis yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba'i bar du dmigs pa ma mchis so// sa'i khams su dmigs pa ma mchis/ chu'i
287a2(nyi khri): khams dang / me'i khams dang / rlung gi khams dang / nam mkha'i khams dang / rnam par shes pa'i khams su dmigs pa ma mchis so// ma rig par dmigs pa ma mchis/ 'du byed dang / rnam
287a3(nyi khri): par shes pa dang / ming dang gzugs dang / skye mched drug dang / reg pa dang / tshor ba dang / sred pa dang / len pa dang / srid pa dang / skye ba dang / rga shir dmigs pa ma mchis so// sbyin pa'i pha rol
287a4(nyi khri): tu phyin par dmigs pa ma mchis/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab
287a5(nyi khri): kyi pha rol tu phyin par dmigs pa ma mchis so// nang stong pa nyid du dmigs pa ma mchis/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du dmigs pa ma mchis so// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams su
287a6(nyi khri): dmigs pa ma mchis/ yang dag par spong ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / dbang po dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad par dmigs pa ma
287a7(nyi khri): mchis so// 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams su dmigs pa ma mchis/ bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams su dmigs pa ma mchis so// rnam par
287b1(nyi khri): thar ba brgyad du dmigs pa ma mchis// mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum dang / mngon par shes pa rnams su dmigs pa ma mchis so// ting nge 'dzin/
287b2(nyi khri): rnams su dmigs pa ma mchis/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams su dmigs pa ma mchis so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams su dmigs pa ma mchis/ mi 'jigs pa rnams dpa ga so so
287b3(nyi khri): yang dag par rig pa rnams dang / snying rje chen po dang / byams pa chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams su dmigs pa ma mchis so// rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bur dmigs
287b4(nyi khri): pa ma mchis lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa nyid du dmigs pa ma mchis so// rang byang chub tu dmigs pa ma mchis so// lam gyi rnam pa shes
287b5(nyi khri): pa nyid dang / byang chub dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos su dmigs pa ma mchis te/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni dmigs pa'i tshul du nye bar gnas pa ma lags so// de ci'i
287b6(nyi khri): slad du zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar gang gis dmigs par bgyi ba dang / gang la dmigs par bgyi ba dang / gang du dmigs par bgyi ba de lta bu'i ngo bo nyid de la ma mchis so// bcom ldan
287b7(nyi khri): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ko'u shi ka de de bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de mi dmigs pa'i tshul du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yun ring por spyad
288a1(nyi khri): pas des byang chub kyang mi dmigs na/ sangs rgyas lta ci smos/ sangs rgyas kyi chos lta ci smos/ brgya byin gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems
288a2(nyi khri): dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod kyi/ de ma lags pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa gzhan la mi spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ko'u shi ka byang chub sems dpa' sems
288a3(nyi khri): dpa' chen po ni pha rol tu phyin pa drug po kun la'ang de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis spyod de/ des sbyid pa'ang mi dmigs/ gtong ba'ang mi dmigs/ len pa'ang mi dmigs so// tshul khrims kyang mi
288a4(nyi khri): dmigs/ tshul khrims dang ldan pa'ang mi dmigs/ tshul khrims ngan pa'ang ma dmigs so// bzod pa'ang mi dmigs/ bzod pa dang ldan pa'ang mi dmigs/ gnod sems kyang mi dmigs so//
288a5(nyi khri): brtson 'grus kyang mi dmigs/ brtson 'grus dang ldan pa'ang mi dmigs/ le lo'ang mi dmigs so// bsam gtan yang mi dmigs/ bsam gtan dang ldan pa'ang mi dmigs/ 'khrug
288a6(nyi khri): pa'ang mi dmigs so// shes rab kyang mi dmigs/ shes rab dang ldan pa'ang mi dmigs/ shes rab 'chal pa'ang mi dmigs so// ko'u shi ka shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni gzugs mi
288a7(nyi khri): dmigs pa'i tshul dang / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / mig mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid/
288b1(nyi khri): mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / gzugs mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / spa dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg pa dang / chos mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / mig gi rnam par shes pa mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang //
288b2(nyi khri): ba'i rnam par shes pa dang / sna'i rnam par shes pa dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / mig gi 'dus te reg/
288b3(nyi khri): pa mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa mi dmigs pa'i tshul
288b4(nyi khri): dang mig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dang / snga'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa
288b5(nyi khri): las byung ba'i tshor ba dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / sa'i khams mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / chu'i kham
288b6(nyi khri): dang / me'i khams dang / rlung gi khams dang / nam mkha'i khams dang / rnam par shes pa'i khams mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / ma rig pa mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa
288b7(nyi khri): dang ming dang gzugs dang / skye mched drug dang / reg pa dang // tshor ba dang / sred pa dang / len pa dang / srid pa dang / skye ba dang / rga shi mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa mi dmigs
289a1(nyi khri): pa'i tshul dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha
289a2(nyi khri): rol tu phyin pa mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / nang stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa
289a3(nyi khri): bdun mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang / bsam gtan rnams dang / tshad med pa rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang /
289a4(nyi khri): rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum dang / mngon par shes pa lnga dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs kyi
289a5(nyi khri): thams cad mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres
289a6(nyi khri): pa bco brgyad mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa nyid dang / rang byang chub dang
289a7(nyi khri): lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / chos thams cad mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa yongs su
289b1(nyi khri): gtong ba'i sbyor ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba la sngor du 'gro ba'o// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims srung ba'i tshul khrims kyis
289b2(nyi khri): rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba la sngon du 'gro ba'o// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzod pa sgom pa'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs
289b3(nyi khri): par bya ba la sngon du 'gro ba'o// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus rtsom pa'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba la sngon du 'gro ba'o//
289b4(nyi khri): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan la snyoms par 'jug pa'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba la sngon du 'gro ba'o// shes rab
289b5(nyi khri): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos thams cad la rnam par lta ba'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba la sngon du 'gro ba'o// ko'u shi ka 'di lta ste
289b6(nyi khri): dper na 'dzam bu gling gi shing rnams lo ma sna tshogs can// me tog sna tshogs can 'bras bu sna tshogs can/ dbyibs sna tshogs can/ chu zheng sna tshogs can du 'khod kyang / de dag gi grib pa la
289b7(nyi khri): khyad par ram bye brag mi dmigs te/ gzhan du na grib ma grib ma zhes bya ba'i grangs su 'gro bar zad do// kro'u shi ka de bzhin du pha rol tu phyin pa lnga shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su zin pa/
290a1(nyi khri): thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes su yongs su bsngos pa rnams la'ang khyad par ram bye brag mi dmigs so// brgya byin gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das shes/
290a2(nyi khri): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni yon tan thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bgyid pa'i slad du yon tan chen po dang ldan pa'o// bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni yon tan tshad ma mchis pa dang ldan
290a3(nyi khri): pa'i slad du/ tshad ma mchis pa'i yon tan dang ldan pa'o// bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin ba ni yon tan mu ma mchis pa dang ldan pa'i slad du/ yon tan kun tu mtha' yas pa dang ldan
290a4(nyi khri): pa'o// bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di bris shing glegs bam du bgyis te bcangs pa dang / me tog dang / 'phreng ba dang / spos
290a5(nyi khri): dang dbyug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan+ta dang / sil snyan sna tshogs kyis rim gror bgyis/ bkur stir bgyis/ bsti spyang du bgyis/ mchod par/
290a6(nyi khri): bgyis te/ de nas gong du ji skad bstan pa bzhin du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshul bzhin du yid la bgyis pa dang / rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo la las shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di glegs
290a7(nyi khri): bam du bgyis te gzhan la stsal na/ de gnyis las gang gi bsod nams cher 'phel bar 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ko'u shi ka de bas na khyod nyid la dris/ khyod kyis ji ltar
290b1(nyi khri): bzod pa de ltar lung stod cig/ ko'u shi ka de ji snyam du sems/ rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo la las de bzhir gshegs pa'i sku gdung mang po la me tog dang / 'phreng ba dang / spos dang gzug pa
290b2(nyi khri): dang phye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / sil snyan sna tshogs kyis rim gror byas/ bkur stir byas ba sti stang du byas mchod par byas pa dang / rigs
290b3(nyi khri): kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo la las de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung yungs kar gyi 'bru tsam zhig gzhan la byin te bgo bshar byas pa dang / rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo la las de bzhin
290b4(nyi khri): gshegs pa'i sku gdung yungs kar gyi 'bru tsam po de blangs te/ me tog dang / 'phreng ba dang / spos dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / sil
290b5(nyi khri): sman sna tshogs kyis rim gror byas/ bkur stir byas/ bsti stang du byas// mchod par byas na/ de dag las gang gis bsod nams cher 'phel ba yin/ brgya byin gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das
290b6(nyi khri): bdag gis/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa'i don 'tshal te/ de la rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung mang po la me tog dang / 'phreng ba dang / spos dang /
290b7(nyi khri): byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / sil snyan sna tshogs kyis bkur stir bgyis/ rim gror bgyis/ bsti stang du bgyis/ mchod par bgyis
291a1(nyi khri): ba bas/ gang la las de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung yungs kar gyi 'bru tsam gzhan la stsal na/ 'di ni de bas bsod nams cher 'phel lo// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs/
291a2(nyi khri): ba dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis kyang don de nyid gzigs te rdo rje lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin la mnyam par gzhag nas rdo rje lta bu'i sku bshig ste/ sems can gyi ris na de bzhin gshegs
291a3(nyi khri): pa'i ring bsrel gyis 'dul ba'i sems can mchis pa rnams kyi slad du thugs rje chen po bskyed do// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung du byin gyis brlabs so// bcom ldan 'das gang la las chung ngu na/
291a4(nyi khri): de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung yungs kar gyi 'bru tsam la mchod pa sna tshogs kyis mchod pa bgyis na/ de dag thams cad kyang dge ba'i rtsa ba de'i mthar ma thug par sdug bsngal mthar 'byin par 'gyur/
291a5(nyi khri): ro// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ko'u shi ka de de bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ ko'u shi ka rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo la las shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di
291a6(nyi khri): glegs bam du byas te/ me tog dang / 'phreng ba dang / spos dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / sil snyan sna tshogs kyis rim gror byas/ bkur
291a7(nyi khri): stir byas/ bsti stang du byas/ mchod par byas pa bas/ gang la las shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'ang bris te/ chos kyi dga' bas gzhan la byin na// rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de'i
291b1(nyi khri): bsod nams cher 'phel bar 'gyur ro// ko'u shi ka gzhar yang rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo la las shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ji skad du bstan pa bzhin du gzhan gyi drung du
291b2(nyi khri): song ste/ bshad shing bstan pa dang / brjod cing bkrol ba dang / rnam par phye ste gsal bar byas na/ rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo deni rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo snga ba dag pas
291b3(nyi khri): bsod nams cher 'phel te/ de ni ston pa yin par bsam mo// bla ma'i gnas mkhas pa tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa la la zhig yin par bsam mo// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni shes rab
291b4(nyi khri): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid stong pa yin te/ ston pa ni gzhan shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni gzhan zhes bya ba med kyi/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang stod pa/ stong pa nyid kyang shes rab kyi
291b5(nyi khri): pha rol tu phyin pa'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid la bslabs pas/ 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
291b6(nyi khri): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so// mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya
291b7(nyi khri): bar 'gyur ro// tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa de dag kyang phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams las gud na med de/ de dag kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la bslabs shing / zan
292a1(nyi khri): med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so// mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro// ko'u shi ka/
292a2(nyi khri): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid la bslabs shing / nyan thos kyi theg pa pa rnams kyis kyang rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob bo// 'thob bo// thob par 'gyur ro// dgra bcom pa nyid kyi bar du thob bo//
292a3(nyi khri): 'thob bo// thob par 'gyur ro// rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa rnams kyis kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid la bslabs shing / rang byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so// mngon par
292a4(nyi khri): rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid la bslabs shing ga/ byang chub sem
292a5(nyi khri): dpa'i skyon med par zhugs so// 'jug go// 'jug par 'gyur ro// bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so// mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// mngon
292a6(nyi khri): par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro// ko'u shi ka de bas na rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams la me tog dang / 'phreng ba
292a7(nyi khri): dang spos dang / thug pa dang 'aM/ phye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dad dang / sil skar sna tshogs kyis rim gror bya bar 'dod pa dang / bkur stir bya bar 'dod pa
292b1(nyi khri): dang bsti stang du bya bar 'dod pa dang mchod par bya bar 'dod pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyir pa 'di bris te ma tog dang / 'phreng ba dang / spos dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs/
292b2(nyi khri): rang rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / sal snyan sna tshogs kyis rim gror bya'o// bkur skyer bya'o// bsti stang du bya'o// mchod par bya'o// koT shi ka ngas don de nyid kyi dbang yang dag par mthong ste/
292b3(nyi khri): blan med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas 'di snyam ste/ gang zhig la bdag gis rim gro dang / bkur sti dang / bsti stang dang / mchod par byas te/ rter/
292b4(nyi khri): cing rnam par spyad par bya sa pa na/ ko'u shi ka de la ngas 'jig rten lnga dang bcas pa/ bdud dang bcas pa/ tshangs pa dang bcas pa/ dge sbyong dang bram zer bcas pa'i skye dgu dang / lha dang / mi dang /
292b5(nyi khri): lha ma yin du bcos pa'i nang nang dang 'dra ba 'am/ lhag par yang dag par rjes su ma mthong nas/ de la ngas 'di snyam du bsams te/ de lta yin na bdag gis chos zhi ba bzang po gang bdag nyid
292b6(nyi khri): kyis mngon par sangs rgyas pa de nyid la rim gro dang / bkur sti dang / bsti stang dang / mchod par bya ste/ brten cing rnam par spyad par bya'o snyam du bsams so// ko'u shi ka chos de'ang gang zhe
292b7(nyi khri): na'adi lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid yin te/ ko'u shi ka de ltar nga nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid la rim gror byed/ bkur stir byed/ bsti stang du byed/ mchod
293a1(nyi khri): par byed de/ de ltar rim gror byed/ bkur sti dang / bste stang dang / mchod par byas shing rnam par spyod na/ ko'u shi ka rigs kyi 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo bla na med pa yang
293a2(nyi khri): dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'dod pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la me tog dang / 'phreng ba dang / spos dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na tha'
293a3(nyi khri): dang gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / sil snyan sna tshogs kyis rim gror bya ba dang / bkur stir bya ba dang / bsti stang du bya ba dang / mchod par bya ba lta ci smos/ nyan
293a4(nyi khri): thos kyi theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de dag gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid la me
293a5(nyi khri): tog dang / 'phreng ba dang / spos dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / sil sAr sna tshogs kyis rim gror bya ba dang / bkur
293a6(nyi khri): stir bya ba dang / bsti stang du bya ba dang / mchod par bya ba lta ci smos/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams
293a7(nyi khri): so// byang chub sems dpa'o las byung ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams so// de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs
293b1(nyi khri): sangs rgyas rnams las byung ba nan thos dang rang sangs rgyas rnams so// katsu shi ka de lwa bsan byang chub sems dpa' theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu bo 'am/ nyan thos kyi/
293b2(nyi khri): theg pa pa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'ang tshad la me tog dang / 'greng ba dang / spos dang / drug pa dang / phyem
293b3(nyi khri): dang ngan bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang sil snyan sna tshogs kyis rim gror bya'o// bkur stir bya'o// bsti stang du bya'o// mchod par bya'o// de ltar del
293b4(nyi khri): slob pa'i rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so// mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// mngon
293b5(nyi khri): bar rdzogs par 'tshang chu bar 'gyur ro// nyan thos kyi theg pa pa rnams kyis kyang dgra bcom pa nyid thob bo// 'thob bo// thob par 'gyur ro// rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa rnams kyis kyang dang
293b6(nyi khri): sangs rgyas kyi byang chub thob bo// 'thob bo// 'thob par 'gyur ro// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag nyi shu lnga pa las le'u nyi shu gnyis pa'o// / de nas bcom
293b7(nyi khri): ldan 'das kyis/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin la bka' stsal pa/ ko'u shi ka rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo la lo zhig gis gal te 'dzam bu gling gi sems can de dag dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam
294a1(nyi khri): la bkod par gyur na/ ko'u shi ka de ji snyam du sems/ rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de de'i rgyus bsod nams mang du 'phel bar 'gyur ram/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan/
294a2(nyi khri): 'das mang ngo // bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo // bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ko'u shi ka de bas kyang la la zhig gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di glegs bam du byas te klog pa
294a3(nyi khri): dang bri ba 'am/ kha ton bya ba'i phyir gzhan la byin na bsod nams ches mang du 'phel lo// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las zag pa med pa'i chos gang la rigs kyi
294a4(nyi khri): bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo slob cing yang dag pa'i skyon med par zhugs par gyur pa dang / 'jug pa dang / 'jug par 'gyur ba dang dgra bcom pa nyid kyi bar du thob par gyur pa dang / 'thob
294a5(nyi khri): ba dang / thob par 'gyur ba dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa rnams kyis rang sangs rgyas kyi byang chub thob par gyur pa dang / 'thob pa dang / thob par 'gyur ba dang / bla na med pa yang dag
294a6(nyi khri): par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par zhugs pa rnams kyis byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med par zhugs pa dang / 'jug pa dang / 'jug par 'gyur ba dang / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzog
294a7(nyi khri): pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa dang / mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba dang mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos mang po rgya cher bstar to//
294b1(nyi khri): koru shi ka zag pa med pa'i chos de dag kyang gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i bar dang / nang stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong ba/
294b2(nyi khri): nyid kyi bar dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang /
294b3(nyi khri): rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smodan pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa drug dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs
294b4(nyi khri): pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / dga' ba chen po
294b5(nyi khri): dang gtang snyoms chen po dag ste/ sangs rgyas kyi chos tshad med pa gzhan dag kyang rgya cher bstan to// ko'u shi ka rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis sems
294b6(nyi khri): can gcig cig rgyur du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la gzhag na/ de'i bsod nams ches mang du 'phel gyi/ 'dzam bu gling gi sems can rnams dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la bkod pas ri ma yin no//
294b7(nyi khri): de ci'i phyir zhe ra/ ke'u she ka dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la bkod pa'i sems can rnams ni/ sems cad dmyal ba dang / byol song gi skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten nas yongs su
295a1(nyi khri): grol ba ma yin no// ko'u shi ka rgyudan du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la bkod pa'i sems can ni/ sems can dmyal ba dang / byol song gi skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten yongs
295a2(nyi khri): su grol ba'i phyir te/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa nyid la bkod pa lta ci smos/ ko'u shi ka gang la las 'dzam bu gling gi sems can rnams
295a3(nyi khri): rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la bkod pa dang / dgra bcom pa nyid kyi bar la bkod pa bas/ la la zhig gis sems can gcig cig rang byang chub la gzhag na/ de'i bsod nams ches mang du 'phel lo// rig
295a4(nyi khri): kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu po la la zhig gis 'dzam bu gling gi sems can thams cad rang byang chub la bkod pa bas/ rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis sems can gcig cig bla na med
295a5(nyi khri): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la gzhag na/ de'i bsod nams ches mang du 'phel lo// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sems can gcig pu bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bkod pa de ni
295a6(nyi khri): sangs rgyas kyi tshul rgyud mi gcad pa'i don du zhugs pa'i phyir ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ko'u shi ka byang chub sems dpa' las byung ba ni rgyun du zhugs pa dang / dgra bcom pa nyid kyi bar dang / rang sangs/
295a7(nyi khri): rgyas rnams so// ko'u shi ka byang chub sems dpa' las byung ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams so// ko'u shi ka rnam grangs des na/ 'di ltar
295b1(nyi khri): byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyang mchod cing rim gror bya ba yin te/ 'jig rten lha dang bcas pa/ bdud dang bcas pa/ tshangs pa dang bcas pa/ dge slong dang bram zer bcas pa'i sku dgus me tog dang /
295b2(nyi khri): 'phreng ba dang / spos dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / sil spyan sna tshogs kyis rim gror bya ba dang / bkur stir bya ba dang /
295b3(nyi khri): bsti stang du bya ba dang / mchod par bya ba yin par shes par bya'o// ko'u shi ka rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis 'dzam bu gling gi sems can thams cad dge
295b4(nyi khri): ba bcu'i las kyi lam la bkod par gyur na/ ko'u shi ka de ji snyam du sems/ rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams de'i rgyus mang du 'phel lam/ brgya byin gyis gsol pa
295b5(nyi khri): bcom ldan 'das mang ngo // de bar gshegs pa mang ngo // bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ko'u shi ka de bas kyang rigs kyi buM 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu
295b6(nyi khri): phyin pa 'di glegs bam la bri ba 'am/ klog pa 'am/ kha ton du bya ba'i phyir gzhan la byin na bsod nams ches mang du 'phel lo// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las zag
295b7(nyi khri): pa med pa'i chos rnams rgya cher bstan te/ de dag la bslabs shing rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo dag yang dag pa'i skyon med par zhugs par gyur to// 'jug go// 'jug par 'gyur ro//
296a1(nyi khri): dgra bcom pa nyid kyi bar du thob bo// 'thob bo// thob par 'gyur ro// rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa rnams kyis rang byang chub thob par gyur to// 'thob bo// thob par 'gyur ro// byang
296a2(nyi khri): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyang yang dag pa'i spyod med par zhugs par gyur to// 'jug go// 'jug par 'gyur ro// bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par
296a3(nyi khri): sangs rgyas so// mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro// ko'u shi ka zag pa med pa'i chos de dag kyang gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang / stong pa
296a4(nyi khri): nyid thams cad dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdud dang / 'phags pa'i bded pa bzhi dang / bsam gtan rnams dang / tshad med pa rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa
296a5(nyi khri): rnams dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum dang / mngon par shes pa drug dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gzung
296a6(nyi khri): kyi sgo thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang / byams pa
296a7(nyi khri): chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang dga' ba chen po dang / gtang snyoms chen po dag ste sangs rgyas kyi chos tshad med pa gzhan dag kyang rgya cher bstar to// ko'u shi ka rnam grangs des kyang rigs
296b1(nyi khri): tsa zu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyir pa'ang glegs pab du byas te krogs pa dang / bri ba dang / kha ton du bya ba'i phyir gnan la byed na de de ba sod rapas ches mang du 'phel bar
296b2(nyi khri): shes par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ karu shi ka shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las chos thams cad rgya cher bstan to// de dag yod pas rgyal rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams long ngo // zab po'i rigs che dang /
296b3(nyi khri): mtho ba dang / khyim bdag gi rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do// rgyal chen pa bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams yod do// sum cu rtsa gsum dang / mtshe ma dang / dga' ldan dang / 'phrul dga'
296b4(nyi khri): dang gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams dang / tshangs ris dang tshangs lha nye par dang / tshangs pa kun 'khor dang / tshangs chen dang / 'og mir gyi bar gyi lha rnams dang / nam mkha'
296b5(nyi khri): mtha' yas skye mched dang / 'du shes med 'du shes med mir skye mched kyi bar gyi lha rnams yod do// pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad yod do// stong pa nyid thams cad yod do// byang chub kyi phyogs kyi
296b6(nyi khri): chos sum cu rtse bdur yod do// 'phags pa'i bdedar ba rnams dang / bsam gtan rnams dang / tshad med pa rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams yod do// rang
296b7(nyi khri): par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyospoms par 'jug pa dgu yod do// rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum dang / mngon par shes pa rnams yod do// ting nge 'dzin rnabs dang / gzungs
297a1(nyi khri): kye sgo rnams yod do// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang / byams pa chen po dang snying rje chen
297a2(nyi khri): po dang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams yod do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du yod do// rgyun du zhugs pa dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang / phyir mi 'ong ba dang / dgra
297a3(nyi khri): bcom pa dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams yod do// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams yod do// de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams
297a4(nyi khri): yod do// ko'u shi ka 'dzab bu gling gi sems can rnams dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la bkod pa dang / rang byang chub kyi bar la bkod pa lta zhog gi/ ko'u shig gling bzhi pa'i 'jig
297a5(nyi khri): rten gyi khams kyi sems can ji sbed pa de dag rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo la las dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la rab tu bkod na/ ko'u shi ka de ji snyam du sems/ rigs kyi bu
297a6(nyi khri): 'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams de'i rgyus mang du 'phel lam gsol pa bcom ldan 'das mang ngo // bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo // bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal/
297a7(nyi khri): go chu shi ga de bas rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di glegs bam la bri ba dang klog pa dang / kha tor bya ba'i phyir gzhan la byin na /
297b1(nyi khri): rnams ches mang du 'phel lo// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ko'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las skyes pa ni nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa'i chos
297b2(nyi khri): thams cad dang sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad do/ ko'u shi ka grang chen po bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can rnams dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la bkod pa dang /
297b3(nyi khri): rang byang chub kyi bar la bkod pa lta zhog gi/ ko'u shi ka stong gi 'jig rten gyi khams byung bu'i sems can ji snyed cig yod pa de dag rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo la las dge ba bcu'i las
297b4(nyi khri): kyi lam la rab tu bkod/ rang byang chub kyi bar la rab tu bkod na/ ko'u shi ka de ji snyam du sems rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams de'i rgyus mang du
297b5(nyi khri): 'phel lam gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mang ngo // bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo // bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ko'u shi ka de bas rigs kyi bu 'am/
297b6(nyi khri): rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di glegs bam bkug pa 'am/ 'bri ba dang / kha ton bya ba'i phyir gzhan la byin na bsod nams ches mang du 'phel lo//
297b7(nyi khri): ko'u shi ka stong gi 'jig rten gyi khams byung bu lta zhog gi/ ko'u shi ka stong gnyis pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'bring po'i sems can ji snyed pa de dag rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo
298a1(nyi khri): la las dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la rab tu bkod pa dang / rang byang chub kyi bar la rab tu bkod na/ ko'u shi ka de ji snyam du sems rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo
298a2(nyi khri): de'i bsod nams de'i rgyus mang du 'phel lam gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mang ngo // bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo // bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ko'u shi ka de bas rigs
298a3(nyi khri): kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di grags bam la bri ba dang / klog pa dang / kha ton bya ba'i phyir gzhan la byin na bsod nams ches mang du 'phel lo// koT/
298a4(nyi khri): shi ka stong gnyis pa 'jig rten gyi khams 'bring po lta zhog gi/ ko'u shi ka stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can ji snyed pa de dag rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu po la/
298a5(nyi khri): las dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la rab tu bkod pa dang / rang byang chub kyi bar la rab tu bkod na/ ko'u shi ka de ji snyab du sems/ rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams de'i rgyus
298a6(nyi khri): mang du 'phel lam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mang ngo // bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo // bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kauru shi ka de bas rigs kyi bu 'pha/ rigs kyi bur/
298a7(nyi khri): gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di glegs bam la bri ba dang / klog pa dang / kha ton bya ba'i phyir gzhan la byin na bsod nams ches mang du 'phel lo// koru shi stong gsum/
298b1(nyi khri): kyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams stan ga ga/ ko'u shig phyogs bcu'i phyogs re re zhing 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag sems can ji snyed cig yod pa de dag rigs kyi bu'am
298b2(nyi khri): rigs kyi bu mo la las dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la rab tu bkod pa dang / rang byang chub kyi bar la rab tu bkod da/ ko'u shi ka de ji snyam du sems/ rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de'i
298b3(nyi khri): bsod nams de'i rgyus mang du 'phel lam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mang ngo // bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo // bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ko'u shi ka de bas rigs
298b4(nyi khri): kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di glegs bam la bri ba dang / klog pa dang / kha ton bya ba'i phyir gzhan la byin na/ bsod nams ches mang du 'phel
298b5(nyi khri): lo// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ko'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las zag pa med pa'i chos rnams rgya cher bstan te/ de dag la bslabs shing rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi
298b6(nyi khri): bu mo de dag yang dag pa'i skyon med par zhugs par gyur to// 'jug go// 'jug par 'gyur ro// dgra bcom pa nyid kyi bar du thob par gyur to// 'thob bo// thob par 'gyur ro// rang byang chub
298b7(nyi khri): thob par gyur to// 'thob bo// thob par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyang byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med par zhugs par gyur to// 'jug go/ 'jug par
299a1(nyi khri): 'gyur ro// bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so// mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya
299a2(nyi khri): bar 'gyur ro// ko'u shi ka zag pa med pa'i chos de dag kyang gang zhe ra/ 'di lta ste/ pha rol tu phyin pa rnams dang / rang stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar dang / byang
299a3(nyi khri): chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa dang / bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang /
299a4(nyi khri): mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum dang / mngon par shes pa drug dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs
299a5(nyi khri): ba'i stobs bcu dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos tshad med pa'i bar gzhan dag kyang rgya cher bstan to// ko'u shi ka rnam grangs des kyang rigs kyi bu 'am/
299a6(nyi khri): rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu byed pa 'di glegs bam du bris shing klog pa dang bri ba dang / kha tor du bya ba'i phyir gzhan la byin da/ de bas do'i bsod nams ches mang du 'phel bar
299a7(nyi khri): shes par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ko'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las chos thams cad rgya cher bstan te/ de dag yod pas rgyal rigs che zhing mtho ba dang bram ze'i
299b1(nyi khri): ga nang dang / kyang bdagag gas can 'tho ba dang / rnam can can 'aras kyi lha rabs mang do// srab rgya rtsa gsupa dang / mdzes dang / ga' ldan dang / 'phrul dag dang /
299b2(nyi khri): gan 'drus dbang byed kyi lnga rnams dang / tshangs ris dang / tshangs ldan pan dang / tshangs pa kun 'khor dang / tshangs chen dang / 'og zin gyi bar gyi sa rnams dang / nam mkha' ma
299b3(nyi khri): las sgyu ba dang / 'du shes med 'du shes med par sre mche sdebar gyi sa rnams yod do// pa rol tu byed parnabs yod // dang spang pa nyid yod do// dngas pa med pa'i nga za nang spang banyid kyi
299b4(nyi khri): bang du longango // byang chub kyi thugs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun yong ngo // sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar du med do// thams cad shes pa nyid yod do// lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid
299b5(nyi khri): dang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen panyid yod do// rgyun du zhugs pa rnams yod do// lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang / phyir mo 'ong ba dang / dgra bcom pa dang / rang byang chub rnams yod do// byang chub
299b6(nyi khri): 'amabs dpa pyon pas sod / de 'anan gshegs pa das bcom pa la dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams yong/ shig gas yang 'dzum du
299b7(nyi khri): gling gi mi ji snyed pa de dag rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo la las bsam gtan bzhi la bkod/ tshad med pa bzhi la bkod/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi la bkod
300a1(nyi khri): mngon par shes pa lnga la bkod na/ ko'u shi ka de ji snyam du sems rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams de'i rgyus mang du 'phel lam/ gsol pa/
300a2(nyi khri): bcom ldan 'das mang ngo // bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo // bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ko'u shi ka de bas rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu
300a3(nyi khri): byin pa 'di glegs bam bklag pa 'am/ bri ba dang / kha ton bya ba'i phyir gzhan la byin da/ bsod nams ches mang du 'phel lo// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ko'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha
300a4(nyi khri): rol tu phyin pa 'di las chos thams cad rgya cher bstan to// ko'u shi ka 'dzam bu gling lta'ang zhog gi/ gling chen po bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyang zhog/ stong gi 'jig
300a5(nyi khri): rten gyi khams kyang zhog/ stong gnyis kyi 'jig rten gyi khams kyang zhog/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams lta'ang zhog gi/ ko'u shi ku shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams
300a6(nyi khri): gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sems can ji snyed pa dang / lho dang / nub dang / byang dang / byang shar dang / shar lho dang / lho nub dang / nub byang dang / 'og dang
300a7(nyi khri): steng gi phyogs kyi phyogs re re zhing 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sems can ji srid pa de dag rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu pa~M la las bsam gtan bzhi la bkod/ tshang
300b1(nyi khri): mang ba bzhi la bkod/ gzugs med pa'i soms par 'jug pa bzhi la bkod/ mngon par shes pa lnga la bkodad/ ko'u shi ka de ji snyam du sems// rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi thum
300b2(nyi khri): de'i bsod napas de'i rgyus mang du 'phel lam gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mang ngo // bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo // bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ko'u shi ka de bas rigs
300b3(nyi khri): kyi bu 'am/ rigs bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di glegs bam klog pa dang / bri ba dang / kha ton bya ba'i phyir gzhan la byin na bsod nams ches mang du 'phel lo// de ci'i phyir
300b4(nyi khri): zhen/ ko'u shi ka der 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las zag pa med pa'i chos rnams rgya cher bstan te/ de dag la bslabs shing rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo dag yang dag
300b5(nyi khri): ba'i skyon med par zhugs so// 'jug go// 'jug par 'gyur ro// rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to// 'thob bo// thob par 'gyur ro// dgra bcom pa nyid kyi bar du thob
300b6(nyi khri): par gyur to// 'thob bo// thob par 'gyur ro// rang byang chub thob par gyur to// 'thob bo// thob par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyang byang chub sems
300b7(nyi khri): dpa'i sbyor med par zhugs par gyur to// 'jug go// 'jug par 'gyur ro// bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so// mngon par rdzog
301a1(nyi khri): par 'tshang rgya'o// mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro// ko'u shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la las shes rab kyi
301a2(nyi khri): pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la byed na de'i bsod nams ches pang du 'phel gyi/ 'dzam bu gling gi sems
301a3(nyi khri): can rnams dang / stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi bar gyi sems can dang / phyogs bcu kur gyi phyogs rerare zhing 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sems can ji
301a4(nyi khri): snyed pa de dag dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la bkod pa dang / bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / mngon par shes pa lnga la bkod
301a5(nyi khri): pas ni ma yin no// de la tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa ni 'di yid te/ gnyis la spyod pa'ang ma yin/ mi gnyis pa la spyod pa'ang ma yin pa'i thos/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'ang
301a6(nyi khri): 'dzin pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa'o// gnyis la spyod pa'ang ma yin/ mi gnyis pa la spyod pa'ang ma yin pa'i thos/
301a7(nyi khri): bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa/
301b1(nyi khri): 'dzin pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa'o// gnyis la spyod pa'ang ma yin/ mi gnyis pa la spyod pa'ang ma yin pa'i thos/
301b2(nyi khri): nang stong pa nyid 'dzin pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa'o// gnyis la spyod pa'ang ma yin/ mi gnyis pa la spyod pa'ang
